LanguageData.SolarRiftLightRestoredSTNL: The solar rift has repositioned itself in front of the sun-blocking astral body, effectively ending the eclipse.
LanguageData.ApocalypsisLuminisDeadWorldSTNL: Cannot use this ability, there is not enough light in the world to absorb.
LanguageData.FurariLuminisDeadWorldSTNL: A Luminis psycaster tried to absorb light, but there wasn't enough to consume.
LanguageData.LastLightSolarPinholeClosedSTNL: The stars are currently too weak to sustain solar pinholes.
LanguageData.RemoveEternalLightSTNL: Restore the light of the universe
LanguageData.ApocalypsisFurariGoodwillDescSTNL: If enabled, the abilities mentioned above will affect your relations with other faction by the amount below this option.
LanguageData.ApocalypsisFurariAnomalyDarknessCheckSTN: Should They Trigger Unnatural Darkness Instead?
LanguageData.ApocalypsisFurariAnomalyDarknessDescSTNL: If enabled, the mentioned abilities will cause the Unnatural Darkness event instead of their own night condition.\n\nDisclaimer: Vanilla Unnatural Darkness only harms player controlled pawns.
